Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a clear representation of how people can communicate over distances using technology.
The student can design and illustrate a string telephone that shows how sound is used to send and receive information between two people.
The student can demonstrate the use of tools and materials in their drawing by clearly illustrating the string telephone setup.
The student can clearly show in the drawing that the device can send or receive sound over a distance.
The student can illustrate how the string telephone meets specific design features like having a string and two cups or similar objects.
The student can depict in their drawing how communication over long distances benefits people.
